tables.name: quasar_atom_pro_lp_transactions
tables.description: This datasource contains transaction data from the LP (liquidity pool) on the Cosmos ecosystem. It captures various details about each transaction, providing insight into the liquidity pool's activity.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the sender in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Identifier for the liquidity pool involved in the transaction.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was processed on the blockchain.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of transaction (e.g., LP creation, token transfer, etc.).

columns.name: raw_tokens
columns.description: Raw amount of tokens transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: base_asset
columns.description: Asset being transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: base_amount
columns.description: Amount of the base asset transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: base_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of the base asset transferred in USD.

columns.name: base_price
columns.description: Price of the base asset at the time of the transaction.

columns.name: asset
columns.description: Asset associated with the base asset.

columns.name: asset_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of the asset associated with the base asset in USD.

columns.name: asset_price
columns.description: Price of the asset associated with the base asset at the time of the transaction.

tables.name: quasar_osmo_pro_lp_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a list of transactions from liquidity pool providers in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the liquidity pool activities and associated asset movements. The data is sourced from blockchain events and represents the flow of assets within the ecosystem.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the transaction on the blockchain.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the sender who initiated the transaction.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Identifier of the liquidity pool involved in the transaction.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was included in a block on the blockchain.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of transaction, such as token transfer or liquidity pool activity.

columns.name: raw_tokens
columns.description: Total number of raw tokens involved in the transaction.

columns.name: osmo_asset
columns.description: Name of the OSMO asset involved in the transaction.

columns.name: osmo_amount
columns.description: Amount of OSMO asset transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: osmo_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of OSMO asset transferred in USD.

columns.name: osmo_price
columns.description: Current price of OSMO asset at the time of the transaction.

columns.name: asset
columns.description: Name of the asset involved in the transaction.

columns.name: asset_amount
columns.description: Amount of asset transferred in the transaction.

columns.name: asset_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of asset transferred in USD.

columns.name: asset_price
columns.description: Current price of the asset at the time of the transaction.
